name: Ritual of the Moon
description: Ritual of the Moon is a 28 day long multi-narrative game exploring loneliness, power, and healing. Once discovering her powers, The Earthâ€™s Council exiles the witch to the moon to live out the rest of her life looking at the earth - and the woman she loves - that she can never go back to.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 1.66 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9c Storage: 2 GB available space
